text: Andrzej Skowroński (born 16 November 1953) is a Polish rower. He competed in the men's quadruple sculls event at the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Polish male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Poland Category:Rowers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Kraków
title: Andrzej Skowroński
